Could not contact the Kegbot server.
Looks like this is your first time running Kegbot. Cool!\n\nWe\'re going to need a little information to get started. Tap the "Next" button below to continue.
Kegbot has been updated. Please verify your current settings before continuing. Tap the "Next" button below to continue.
We need to talk to your Kegbot system in order to load drinkers, tap status, and other information. Please enter the URL of your Kegbot system.
In order to talk to your Kegbot server, the Kegtab application needs an API key.\n\nPlease log in with a manager account in order to accquire an API key for this application.
You\'re all set!\n\nYour Kegtab is now active. Press Next to finish. Please drink responsibly.

Do you want to run this system as a Kegbot Core?

When running as the Kegbot Core, the Kegtab application will read hardware and report drinks back to your Kegbot system.

If you say No, Kegtab will run in browser-only mode, allowing you to look at your Kegbot data. Most people should say Yes.
Set a manager PIN to prevent unauthorized access to Kegtab application settings.\n\nThis value is only used locally. If you forget the PIN value, you will need to reset Kegtab.
